refnamediv.refpurpose: Performs encryption of a (signed) e-mail msg

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function performs encryption of a (signed) e-mail message.

refsect2.title: mail_message
refsect2.para: The text of the e-mail msg.

refsect2.title: array_of_recipient_certificates
refsect2.para: An array of strings containing certificates (per format) of the recipient individuals. The certificates must contain RSA keys. See for reference here.
